caption: The video opens with a group of people in a room, eating and talking while making repairs. Suddenly, a huge robot appears, seemingly targeting one of the men. The man has no choice but to run, eventually hitting a dead end. However, the robot does not kill them but instead spares their lives. Seizing the opportunity, they manage to escape from the robot's grasp. They find their spaceship and flee to a distant place, but in the meantime, the robot dispatches more small robots to pursue them. After an intense and thrilling chase and aerial battle, they work together to finally shake off the pursuing robots.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, ancient age, modern age or future?(Does the technology exists on earth?)

what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
